Go to DAM memo list. Go to the memo list. Mark article marked articles quit marked article Go to shopping cart. Into the shopping cart. You can also enter an alternative delivery address. Delivery address alternative delivery address Leave unchanged to send to the address above. Note: Fields marked with * are mandatory. Your data will not be forwarded to third parties! Correct entries To delete an item, just enter "0" for the order quantity and click on "Update shopping cart" below. If you want to change the order quantity, just enter the required quantity in "Quantity" and click on "Update shopping cart" below. The following items are in your cart You have ordered the following items If your order should be delivered to different address, please enter the full delivery address here.
Plus shipping costs, according to our freight agreement/road toll allowance! All deliveries are completed with the current freight agreement/road toll allowance not included Total weight of your order advance payment credit card amount payable DHL total weigth continue checkout

Order confirmation Thank you for your order! The next steps The delivery of the articles will take place in the next 14 days.
Your order is now complete and has the following order number: The order confirmation will be sent to the following e-mail address: Method of payment To be agreed Please contact us Payment in advance Please transfer the invoice amount to the following bank account: Account holder: Account number: Bank identification code: Bank: BIC: IBAN: Surname: The product will be delivered to you directly. Payable on receipt. Invoice: The ordered item will be delivered with an invoice. Cash payment: We only accept cash payment on collection! Complete the ordering process by paying by credit card PayPal To complete the ordering process by PayPal click here Delivery and order status: The goods remain our property until full payment has been effected. Date of your order: You can check your order status at anytime using your order status code: Check order status! ORDER STATUS: You can view the status of your order at this address: Your order: order number new order order details: You can view the status of your order at this address Thank you for your order

Account holder Account number Bank sort code Bank BIC IBAN

Voucher: Discount: The voucher code you entered seems to be wrong. Please try again. You have already redeemed this voucher code! Calculate new price
Recommend a friend. If you want to change the order quantity, just enter the required quantity in "Quantity" and click on "Update shopping basket" below.+ Your data is transmitted securely via an encoded connection. By making the payment you complete the ordering process!

Your invoice #: Your order #: has the following status (see last line for current status) Additional data for status change: Date/time: Code: Action: Comment: Select order Select Change order status Add order status Comment on new order status Password: Enter password E-mail notification: If you want to be informed of your order status as soon as it has been changed, check the following: The message about the ordering procedure. Update Message to SHOP: Here you can send us a message about your order. Select subject: Customer order sent Order from shop received and accepted Shop is waiting for goods delivery from third party Shop is waiting for customer payment Shop is waiting for customer order Order has been paid Goods have been delivered to customer Vouchers have been delivered to customer Other messages from shop An invoice has been issued An invoice has been sent. This order is tax-free. Customer requires the order to be cancelled Message from customer to shop Customer requires the invoice including tax Customer requires a tax-free invoice Voucher message to the recipient Order dispatched Order completed Order cancelled Remarks: Send message Order confirmation - original: Enter order status code: order status order status code Enter your order status code. The order status code does not exist. Make sure that the code is entered correctly. Try it again. View status
Order status Status: Time: ORDER INFORMATION Remarks: Click on your data to view: The status of your order has been changed: You can view the order status at anytime and change order information if required using your order status code:
Your user name is as follows: Your password is as follows: Your access data for We are delighted to welcome you as a new customer. For future orders you can log on with your user name and your password. Please keep this e-mail in a safe place.
